alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 25 at 3:11PM EDT until September 26 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 11 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Accomack County. * WHEN...From 2 PM to 11 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is expected in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline resulting in a low threat of property damage. Expect up to one foot of water above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks and lawns near the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. SAXIS VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.0 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 25/09 PM 3.8 1.3 1.0 2 NONE 26/10 AM 3.2 0.7 0.7 2 NONE 26/11 PM 4.0 1.5 1.1 2 NONE 27/11 AM 4.5 2.0 1.7 2 MINOR 27/11 PM 4.6 2.1 1.6 2 MINOR 28/12 PM 4.5 2.0 1.5 2 MINOR NASSAWADOX CREEK AT BAYFORD VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.0 FT, MODERATE 1.5 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 25/07 PM 2.9 0.9 1.1 1-2 NONE 26/08 AM 2.8 0.8 1.2 2 NONE 26/08 PM 3.5 1.5 1.7 4 MODERATE 27/09 AM 3.8 1.8 2.0 3 MODERATE 27/10 PM 3.8 1.8 1.9 3 MODERATE 28/10 AM 3.6 1.6 1.7 3 MODERATE CHINCOTEAGUE INLET VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.2 FT, MAJOR 3.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 25/05 PM 3.8 1.0 0.6 1 NONE 26/06 AM 3.6 0.8 1.1 1-2 NONE 26/06 PM 4.8 2.0 1.5 2 MINOR 27/07 AM 4.4 1.6 1.6 2 NONE 27/07 PM 4.6 1.8 1.3 2 MINOR 28/08 AM 4.2 1.4 1.1 2 NONE WACHAPREAGUE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 6.5 FT, MODERATE 7.5 FT, MAJOR 8.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.0 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 3.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 25/06 PM 5.9 1.4 0.9 1 NONE 26/06 AM 5.2 0.7 1.0 1 NONE 26/07 PM 7.1 2.6 2.0 1 MINOR 27/07 AM 7.0 2.5 2.4 1 MINOR 27/08 PM 7.3 2.8 2.1 1 MINOR 28/08 AM 6.5 2.0 1.5 1 MINOR &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
